channel.title: Vendors on madewhere
channel.description: Recent content in Vendors on madewhere

item.title: Heath Ceramics
item.description: Heath Ceramics is primarily known for their ceramic products, but they also act as a vendor for a wide variety of items which appear to be from reasonable sources. They list origin of products they carry prominently on individual product pages.

item.title: Blue Owl
item.description: Blue Owl is a retailer which specializes in workwear, carrying a number of well made brands including a large number Japanese brands. Unfortunately not all of the brands they carry are responsibly made, so research each before buying. They also have a physical store in Seattle, WA.

item.title: WebstaurantStore
item.description: WebstaurantStore is a large online retailer specializing in the food service industry, but they will sell to the general public. They are USA focused, and will prominently display badges on USA-made goods, as well as allowing that as a search constraint.
